segments.text: How did you spend the weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I went to a movie with my boyfriend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was great . The director took a lot of care while framing . They say be has good chance at winning the Oscar for best director . Also I like the actors , some really great new young actors .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it's the classic love story between two people from conflicting backgrounds . But besides a beautiful story , the cinematography is great . There is some really dramatic footage . It's really quite a visual feast . And the soundtrack is moving .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sounds pretty good . Is it a tragedy ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The ending is a bit of a surprise . I don't want to ruin it for you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I like movies with surprise endings , although , sometimes they can be frustrating . Maybe I should invite my girlfriend to go next weekend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It would be a really good choice . The movie is very suitable for lovers to see together . I'm sure you won't regret it .
segments.speaker: S2
